text: "Oh Yeah" also known as "Oh Yeah (There's a Band Playing on the Radio)" or "Oh Yeah (On the Radio)" is a 1980 song by English rock band Roxy Music. It is the second single from their seventh studio album Flesh and Blood. It went to number 5 in the United Kingdom, number 39 in the Netherlands and number 14 in Germany and was released as a single in the United States but did not chart there. ==References== Category:1980 songs Category:Roxy Music songs Category:Soft rock songs
title: Oh Yeah (Roxy Music song)
